input_str:
Microsoft recently released a preview of the Xbox One Anniversary Update that brings more Windows 10 to the Xbox. But if the latest rumors are correct, Microsoft wants to do a whole lot more by bringing the Xbox console experience to Windows 10 PCs.

It’s no secret that Microsoft’s vision for the future of gaming involves combining the Xbox and Windows PCs, and a new report says this could be a very literal marriage. Microsoft has “ambitions to make Xbox One games playable on the PC” minus an Xbox in the living room
